Main.heading: Hi, I'm Umut Cemre
Main.title: I'm a Frontend Developer, specializing in React (NextJS) projects.

About.heading: About Me
About.content: I am a Frontend Developer with a background in civil engineering. After working in civil engineering for a few years, I decided to switch to the software industry. I attended bootcamps and courses in various software fields such as data science, machine learning, and full stack development to improve my skills. Eventually, I chose to focus on the front-end sector. I usually develop my projects using React, and I am currently actively learning Next.js.
